General.Name: Apptech Corp
General.Description: AppTech Payments Corp., a financial technology company, provides electronic payment processing technologies and merchant services in the United States. The company offers merchant transaction services, processing payments for credit and debit cards through point-of-sale equipment, e-commerce gateways, periodic automatic clearing house payments, and gift and loyalty programs. Additionally, the company offers integrated solutions for frictionless digital and mobile payment acceptance, as well as multi-use case, multichannel, API-driven, and account-based issuer processing for card, digital tokens, and payment transfer transaction services. It also provides hosted e-commerce checkout, a flexible payment gateway, text payment technology, alternative payment methods (APMs), and mobile and contactless payments. In addition, it offers FinZeo, a fintech platform. The company was formerly known as AppTech Corp. AppTech Payments Corp. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Carlsbad, California.
General.Address: 5876 Owens Avenue, Carlsbad, CA, United States, 92008
